1.name: Pizza
1.instructions: Prepare the dough, cut tomatoes, add cheese, bake in oven.

1.name: Salad
1.instructions: Wash vegetables, cut cucumbers, add salt, mix everything.

1.name: Omelette
1.instructions: Crack eggs, whisk eggs, fry in pan, add salt.

1.name: Soup
1.instructions: Boil water, chop vegetables, add salt, cook everything.

1.name: Pancakes
1.instructions: Mix flour and eggs, add milk, fry in pan, flip pancake.

1.name: Sandwich
1.instructions: Slice bread, add butter, put cheese, close sandwich.

1.name: Fruit Salad
1.instructions: Peel banana, cut apple, add grapes, mix everything.

1.name: Mashed Potatoes
1.instructions: Peel potatoes, boil potatoes, mash potatoes, add butter.

1.name: Rice with Vegetables
1.instructions: Boil rice, chop carrots, fry vegetables, mix everything.

1.name: Grilled Chicken
1.instructions: Cut chicken, add salt, grill chicken, serve hot.

2.name: Pizza
2.instructions: Prepare the dough, cut tomatoes, add cheese, bake in oven.

2.name: Salad
2.instructions: Wash vegetables, cut cucumbers, slice tomatoes, add dressing.

2.name: Omelette
2.instructions: Crack eggs, whisk eggs, fry in pan, add salt and pepper.

2.name: Pancakes
2.instructions: Mix ingredients, heat pan, pour batter, flip pancake.

2.name: Pasta
2.instructions: Boil water, add pasta, cook for 10 minutes, drain water.

2.name: Soup
2.instructions: Boil water, chop vegetables, add to pot, cook for 20 minutes.

2.name: Sandwich
2.instructions: Slice bread, add cheese, add ham, close sandwich.

2.name: Scrambled Eggs
2.instructions: Crack eggs, whisk eggs, heat pan, cook eggs while stirring.

3.name: Lasagna
3.instructions: Prepare sauce, cook meat, layer ingredients, bake in oven.

3.name: Beef Stroganoff
3.instructions: Slice beef, cook beef in pan, add mushrooms and onions, mix with sour cream.

3.name: Stuffed Peppers
3.instructions: Cut peppers, cook rice, prepare filling, bake stuffed peppers.

3.name: Chicken Curry
3.instructions: Cut chicken, fry spices, add chicken and cook, pour coconut milk and simmer.

3.name: Chocolate Cake
3.instructions: Mix dry ingredients, add wet ingredients, pour batter into pan, bake in oven.

3.name: Risotto
3.instructions: Chop onions, toast rice, add broth gradually, stir until creamy.

3.name: Sushi Rolls
3.instructions: Cook rice, slice fish and vegetables, spread rice on seaweed, roll tightly.

3.name: Tiramisu
3.instructions: Whisk eggs and sugar, mix with mascarpone, dip biscuits in coffee, layer and chill.

3.name: Paella
3.instructions: Cook seafood, sauté onions and peppers, add rice and broth, simmer until done.

3.name: Burger
3.instructions: Grill beef patty, toast buns, add toppings, assemble burger.

3.name: Shepherd's Pie
3.instructions: Cook minced meat, prepare mashed potatoes, layer meat and potatoes, bake in oven.

3.name: Ratatouille
3.instructions: Slice vegetables, sauté onions and garlic, layer vegetables, bake in oven.

3.name: Coq au Vin
3.instructions: Marinate chicken, sauté mushrooms and onions, simmer with wine, cook until tender.

3.name: Borscht
3.instructions: Chop beets and vegetables, boil broth, add vegetables, simmer until soft.

3.name: Baklava
3.instructions: Prepare syrup, layer phyllo dough and nuts, brush with butter, bake and drizzle syrup.

4.name: Beef Wellington
4.instructions: Sear beef, prepare mushroom duxelles, wrap in prosciutto and puff pastry, bake until golden.

ingredients.english: Wrap in prosciutto and puff pastry
ingredients.russian: Завернуть в прошутто и слоёное тесто

4.name: Croissants
4.instructions: Prepare dough, fold with butter, chill and roll multiple times, shape and bake.

4.name: Ramen
4.instructions: Prepare broth, cook noodles, marinate and slice pork, assemble with toppings.

4.name: Duck à l'Orange
4.instructions: Roast duck, reduce orange sauce, baste with glaze, serve with sauce.

4.name: Mille-Feuille
4.instructions: Bake puff pastry layers, prepare pastry cream, assemble with layers, dust with sugar.

4.name: Paella
4.instructions: Sauté seafood and chicken, add saffron-infused broth, stir in rice, cook until absorbed.

4.name: Beef Bourguignon
4.instructions: Brown beef, deglaze with red wine, simmer with aromatics, serve with pearl onions.

4.name: Lobster Thermidor
4.instructions: Boil lobster, extract meat, prepare creamy sauce, bake with cheese topping.

4.name: Soufflé
4.instructions: Whip egg whites, fold into flavored base, pour into ramekins, bake until risen.

4.name: Peking Duck
4.instructions: Air-dry duck, coat with glaze, roast until crispy, slice and serve with pancakes.

5.name: Ratatouille
5.instructions: Slice vegetables, prepare tomato sauce, layer and bake, serve with herbs.

5.name: Coq au Vin
5.instructions: Marinate chicken in wine, brown with vegetables, simmer slowly, serve with sauce.

5.name: Boeuf Wellington
5.instructions: Sear beef, prepare mushroom duxelles, wrap in pastry, bake until golden.

5.name: Osso Buco
5.instructions: Sear veal shanks, add aromatics and wine, braise until tender, serve with gremolata.

5.name: Croquembouche
5.instructions: Prepare choux pastry, fill with cream, assemble in tower, drizzle with caramel.

5.name: Beef Bourguignon
5.instructions: Sear beef, sauté aromatics, deglaze with wine, slow-cook until tender, serve with parsley.

ingredients.russian: Тушить на медленном огне до мягкости

5.name: Duck à l’Orange
5.instructions: Score duck skin, render fat, prepare orange glaze, roast until crispy, serve with sauce.

5.name: Paella Valenciana
5.instructions: Sauté seafood and meat, add rice and broth, simmer slowly, let rest before serving.

5.name: Tarte Tatin
5.instructions: Caramelize apples, prepare pastry, arrange and bake, flip before serving.

5.name: Mole Poblano
5.instructions: Toast spices, blend with chocolate and broth, simmer until thick, serve over meat.

6.name: Peking Duck
6.instructions: Air-dry duck, apply maltose glaze, roast until crisp, carve and serve with pancakes.
